member.name: NMLVKEYDOWN
member.summary: Contains information used in processing the LVN_KEYDOWN notification code. This structure is the same as theNMLVKEYDOWN structure but has been renamed to fit standard naming conventions.

member.name: NMLVKEYDOWN.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMLVKEYDOWN.flags
member.summary: This member must always be zero.
